said senator whilst advised upon answer returnd pope king part caesar confederacy enter league union perswade u seek safety exposing self nearer certain danger wherein hath caesar failed u space near upon eighteen year peace injury hath provoked u commonwealth never quiet land war sea doth trouble many advantage peace certainly city would height prosperity shall seeking better fortune bereave self lessen courage rather place hope self believe carry fortune right hand thus ought valiant men whereunto perswaded infinite example worth fortitude minde overcome invincible difficulty greater hope
